title: Art Fight 2025
description: My art contributions to the 2025 Art Fight event

images.imgCaption: My very first attack was for one of my very cool friends and their fresh new bike! :3
images.imgAlt: Green and white cat anthro riding a white bike in front of a stylized explosion background
Bust of a female grey cobra wearing a green cavalier hat and wielding a rapier.
Stylized orange and yellow Charizard anthro character, gesturing with foreshortened hand towards the viewer. He is reclining on a beach setting, shirtless, and generally muscular.

images.imgCaption: One of my very close college friends tried out Art Fight for the first time, so of course I had to celebrate that with an attack
images.imgAlt: Anthro male deer character, eyes closed, wearing a green shirt, hugging a plushie My Little Pony Rainbow Dash plush item in front of a simple background

images.imgCaption: A shitpost that went too far lmao
images.imgAlt: Egregiously muscular green and purple dragon thingy with floating eyeball dots

images.imgCaption: Cyberpunk werewolf gal revenge piece for a cool af friend!
images.imgAlt: Grey, white, and black anthro werewolf woman with 4 ears, growling and gesturing towards the viewer in front of an abstract background

images.imgCaption: Cyborg lizard art as cool revenge for a sick Argent piece
images.imgAlt: Halfbody of anthro yellow lizard with grey face, a cowboy hat, and a cybernetic right arm. He's actively loading a revolver one round at a time, while smoking a cigarette.

images.imgCaption: I finally found a cool as hell protogen to draw!
images.imgAlt: Navy blue and orange-yellow Protogen character headshot

images.imgCaption: Goofy fun image for my friend Sarc
images.imgAlt: Two overly simplified chibi representations of Argent (anthro cobra male) and Sarc (grey female kobold with a huge head crest)

images.imgCaption: Some scalies are hella sleek with their fashion but I think hoodie streetwear will always elude Argent
images.imgAlt: Retail clothing scene with Argent and Donny (snakes) in the foreground. Argent clearly struggling to fit in a hoodie. In the background another snake, Cy, struggles to stuff his hood through the hoodie hole

images.imgCaption: Just a long silly guy!! For my wonderful girlfriend :3
images.imgAlt: Vague kelp forest background. Foreground is a goofy ribbon eel, mega-lengthened for comedic effect.

images.imgCaption: Sometimes you're hit with inspiration like a fucking truck and just have to go all in on something.
images.imgAlt: Painterly portrait of an abstract Dragon god with a floating laserdisk halo.

images.imgCaption: Two silly little guys visit Chicago!!
images.imgAlt: Very simplified bean cat and noodle snake in 4 varied Chicago tourist vignettes: Sears tower, Chicago hotdog, The Bean, and riding the L

images.imgCaption: Argent may be buff as hell but he is NO MATCH for the irascible heel, Diamondback!!
images.imgAlt: A super cool, buff opossum anthro character in green mask and wrestler costume leans forwards toward the viewer with a cheeky grin. An inset at the top left implies that the viewer is a knocked-out Argent.

images.imgCaption: Last certainly doesn't mean least! Almost a tradition that Somite and I need to exchange attacks each year >:3
images.imgAlt: Full-body piece featuring a cool, buff, pink Naga snake. He's simply posing and flashing a peace sign with his fingers to the camera.
